resources.string: Put words to your pictures and leave memories in your blog.
Share your important moments with friends and family.
Follow interesting genres and creators from around the world.

Today I went to the newly opened Uehara Cafe in Yoyogi Uehara. Because today was the grand opening, there was a good sized crowd there. Recently lots of famous shops from Hawaii one after another are coming to Japan. I personally think these pancakes are so hot right now.
